'''Crests and Troughs''' is [[Mualani]]'s [[Night Realm's Gift Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* As a member of the [[People of the Springs]], Mualani can perform the following actions like the [[Koholasaurus]]:
** [[Swimming]] through water and [[Liquid Phlogiston]].
** Entering [[Spiritway]].
